title: Amendment to the Twisted Treeline queue open times
body: Any chance that it is possible to open the queue for the Twisted Treeline game mode on the weekends, preferably from Friday afternoon to perhaps Sunday night? The current times that this mode is open for play is Tuesdays to Thursdays at night, which is quite inconvenient as this is in the middle of the week at a time when people are typically at their busiest and do not have as much time to spare.

replies.body: As a diamond player, I take time to hone my skills and abilities in 3v3. I would greatly love this to be implemented too.
wow are you diamond, I'm a girl would you please teach me and 1v1 me sometime?

Yeah it would be nice man. 

But in my experience we are lucky for it to be even part time on this server...
Agreed! Why is it only Tuesday to Thursday!! Plz make it weekend~
